item.title: About
item.description: I am a UX Resarcher and a Human Factors Engineer UX Researcher I am currently working for UX studio, a Budapest-based UX agency, as a UX researcher. I use various research methods to help clients explore, analyze, test, and validate different product and business ideas. I also worked for Rivian as a UX research intern in the past. At the electric vehicle start-up, I was tasked to create industry leading experience for the vehicle infortainment system.
